MessageTypes.label: Heading (true)
MessageTypes.description: $ will display the heading (integer degrees) (A:GPS GROUND TRUE HEADING,Degrees)

MessageTypes.label: Heading Bug
MessageTypes.description: $ will be displayed as Heading bug (A:AUTOPILOT HEADING LOCK DIR,Degrees)

MessageTypes.label: Airspeed
MessageTypes.description: $ will be displayed as the Airspeed

MessageTypes.label: Altitude
MessageTypes.description: $ Current altitude in feet

MessageTypes.label: CDI Lateral Deviation
MessageTypes.description: $ will be displayed as the CDI Deviation (A:HSI CDI NEEDLE,Number)

MessageTypes.label: Pitch
MessageTypes.description: $ Current pitch in degrees (nearest 0.1)

MessageTypes.label: GPS Ground Speed
MessageTypes.description: $ will be displayed as the ground speed in knots (A:GPS GROUND SPEED,knots)

MessageTypes.label: GPS Ground True Track
MessageTypes.description: $ will be displayed as the GPS Track (A:GPS GROUND TRUE TRACK,Degrees)

MessageTypes.label: Bank Angle
MessageTypes.description: $ Current bank angle in degrees

MessageTypes.label: GPS Drives Nav
MessageTypes.description: $ Does GPS (true) or VOR (false) drive Nav? (A:GPS DRIVES NAV1,Bool)

MessageTypes.label: Target Altitude
MessageTypes.description: $ AP Target altitude for bug and tape

MessageTypes.label: Slip/Skid
MessageTypes.description: $ is slip/skid indicator (A:TURN COORDINATOR BALL,Position)

MessageTypes.label: Current Baro
MessageTypes.description: $ is current baro setting (kohlsman) in inHg (A:KOHLSMAN SETTING HG:index, inHg)

MessageTypes.label: Turn Rate
MessageTypes.description: $ Turn rate in degrees (A:DELTA HEADING RATE,Degrees per second)

MessageTypes.label: Vertical Speed
MessageTypes.description: $ is Vertical speed in ft/min (A:VERTICAL SPEED,Feet per minute)

MessageTypes.label: GSI Needle Valid
MessageTypes.description: $ if the GSI Needle is valid/alive

MessageTypes.label: CDI Needle Valid
MessageTypes.description: $ if the CDI Needle is valid/alive

MessageTypes.label: Nav Course to Steer
MessageTypes.description: $ Nav Course to Steer in Degrees

MessageTypes.label: Glide Slope Deviation
MessageTypes.description: $ is (A:HSI GSI NEEDLE,Number)

MessageTypes.label: Nav Source
MessageTypes.description: $ GPS=0 Nav1=1 Nav2=2

MessageTypes.label: Flight Director Active
MessageTypes.description: $ is 1 for FD on, 0 for off (A:AUTOPILOT FLIGHT DIRECTOR ACTIVE,Bool)

MessageTypes.label: Flight Director Pitch
MessageTypes.description: $ Flight Director Pitch in Degree (A:AUTOPILOT FLIGHT DIRECTOR PITCH,Degrees)

MessageTypes.label: Flight Director Bank
MessageTypes.description: $ Flight Director Bank in degrees (A:AUTOPILOT FLIGHT DIRECTOR BANK,Degrees)

MessageTypes.label: CDI To/From
MessageTypes.description: $ To From: 0: off, 1: To, 2: From (A:NAV TOFROM:index,Enum)

MessageTypes.label: Approach Type (A:GPS APPROACH APPROACH TYPE)
MessageTypes.description: $ is value from that simvar. 0 none, 1 gps, 2 vor, 3 ndb, 4 ils, 5, localizer, etc

MessageTypes.label: OBS (Course) Heading
MessageTypes.description: $ is the OBS heading in degrees (A:GPS OBS VALUE:1, degrees)

MessageTypes.label: AP Active
MessageTypes.description: AP on

MessageTypes.label: AP Lateral Active Mode
MessageTypes.description: Codes: 0=Off, 1=ROL, 2=HDG, 3=GPS, 4=VOR, 5=LOC

MessageTypes.label: AP Lateral Armed Mode Bitflags
MessageTypes.description: Bitflags: 1=LOC, 2=VOR, 4=GPS

MessageTypes.label: AP Vertical Active Mode
MessageTypes.description: 0=Off, 1=ALT, 2=VS, 3=PIT, 4=IAS, 5=ALTS, 6=GS, 7=GP

MessageTypes.label: AP Vertical Armed Mode Bitflags
MessageTypes.description: 1=ALTS, 2=ALT, 4=GS, 8=GP

MessageTypes.label: AP Target VS
MessageTypes.description: VS in feet/min  (A:AUTOPILOT VERTICAL HOLD VAR,Feet/minute)

MessageTypes.label: AP target IAS in knots for FLC
MessageTypes.description: $ is target IAS for FLC

MessageTypes.label: ALT Hold captured target in ft
MessageTypes.description: $ is: (A:AUTOPILOT ALTITUDE LOCK, Bool) (L:ALT_HOLD_PREV, Bool) != if{ (A:AUTOPILOT ALTITUDE LOCK, Bool) if{ (A:INDICATED ALTITUDE, feet) (>L:CAPTURED_ALT) } (A:AUTOPILOT ALTITUDE LOCK, Bool) (>L:ALT_HOLD_PREV) } (L:CAPTURED_ALT)

MessageTypes.label: AP Yaw Damper On
MessageTypes.description: $ is if AP Yaw Damper is active
